title: Did you show Trump the video photographer Eric Garner or George Floyd?
subtitle: A video of Trump saying "I can't breathe" led to questions about whether he was mocking the death of black men during police confrontations.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: A video showing American President Donald Trump mocking the death of George Floyd and/or Eric Garner by pretending to choke and saying, "I can't breathe."
